attributes.additional_details: On June29/2010 I sent an advertisement to New Internationalist,OXFORD.UK.European Court of Human Rights in Vgt Verein gegan TierFabrican VSwitzerland(June28,2001Application No24699/94 said refusal of advt by private media is a violation Art 10 of ECHR.  I request you to pay compensation  for mental tortures.Courts In UK do not give Justice in favor of Indians   living abroad.I can prove it.I can tackle terrorism in 1  Hour TV speech
